entry.content: Recently AWS released support for IPv6 traffic over the AWS Site-to-Site VPN (IPSec). entry.title: AWS Transit Gateway with Direct Connect Gateway and Site-to-Site (IPSec) VPN Backup
entry.summary: This article shows you how to setup a primary active Direct Connect connection between an AWS Transit Gateway and on-premises networks via Direct Connect Gateway, while leveraging a Site-to-Site (IPSec) VPN as backup.
